name: The Taj Mahal Palace, Mumbai
address: Apollo Bandar, Colaba, Mumbai, Maharashtra 400001
about: India's first luxury hotel, an iconic landmark overlooking the Gateway of India. A blend of Moorish, Oriental, and Florentine styles, offering unparalleled service and luxury.

images.caption: The iconic Taj Mahal Palace facade

name: Taj Lands End, Mumbai
address: Bandstand, BJ Road, Mount Mary, Bandra West, Mumbai, Maharashtra 400050
about: A luxury hotel in the heart of Bandra, offering breathtaking views of the Arabian Sea and the Bandra-Worli Sea Link. Known for its world-class service and dining.

images.caption: Taj Lands End with sea view

name: Taj Falaknuma Palace, Hyderabad
address: Engine Bowli, Falaknuma, Hyderabad, Telangana 500053
about: The former palace of the Nizam of Hyderabad, now a grand heritage hotel. Perched 2,000 feet above Hyderabad, it offers a glimpse into the opulent life of Indian royalty.

images.caption: The grand facade of Falaknuma Palace

name: Rambagh Palace, Jaipur
address: Bhawani Singh Rd, Rambagh, Jaipur, Rajasthan 302005
about: The former residence of the Maharaja of Jaipur, Rambagh Palace is a jewel of heritage hospitality. Experience the royal lifestyle amidst manicured gardens and opulent interiors.

name: Taj Lake Palace, Udaipur
address: Pichola, Udaipur, Rajasthan 313001
about: Appearing like a mirage in the middle of Lake Pichola, the Taj Lake Palace is one of the most romantic hotels in the world. This heritage hotel features majestic architecture and offers breathtaking views.

images.caption: Taj Lake Palace in Lake Pichola

name: Taj Ganges, Varanasi
address: Nadesar Palace Grounds, Varanasi, Uttar Pradesh 221002
about: Set amidst 40 acres of lush greenery, Taj Ganges offers a tranquil escape in the ancient city of Varanasi. Enjoy modern comforts, a large swimming pool, and serene gardens.

name: Taj Hotel & Convention Centre, Agra
address: Taj East Gate Rd, Taj Nagari, Phase-1, Agra, Uttar Pradesh 282001
about: A contemporary hotel offering views of the Taj Mahal from select rooms. It features a stunning rooftop infinity pool, multiple dining options, and is a short walk from the monument.

images.caption: Rooftop pool with Taj Mahal view

name: Taj Nadesar Palace, Varanasi
address: Nadesar Palace Grounds, Varanasi, Uttar Pradesh 221002
about: A beautifully restored 19th-century palace that has hosted royalty and statesmen. Set amidst lush gardens, it offers an atmosphere of serene luxury and personalized service.

name: Taj Mahal, Lucknow
address: Vipin Khand, Gomti Nagar, Lucknow, Uttar Pradesh 226010
about: Set amidst 20 acres of landscaped gardens, this majestic hotel offers a tranquil retreat in the city of Nawabs. Its architecture is inspired by Mughal designs.

name: Taj Rishikesh Resort & Spa, Uttarakhand
address: Singthali, Rishikesh, Uttarakhand 249192
about: A serene hideaway on the banks of the river Ganges, this resort offers a spiritual and wellness retreat. With its Himalayan architecture and spectacular views, it's a perfect escape.

images.caption: View of Ganges from the resort

name: Vivanta Dal View, Srinagar
address: Kralsangri, Brein, Srinagar, Jammu and Kashmir 191121
about: Perched on a hilltop, Vivanta Dal View offers panoramic views of the Dal Lake and the surrounding mountains. It's a modern hotel with a touch of Kashmiri charm.

images.caption: Hotel exterior with Dal Lake view

name: Taj Connemara, Chennai
address: Binny Rd, Anna Salai, Chennai, Tamil Nadu 600002
about: Chennai's oldest hotel, beautifully restored. A unique blend of colonial charm and modern amenities in the heart of the city.

name: Taj Savoy Hotel, Ooty
address: 77, Sylks Rd, Ooty, Tamil Nadu 643001
about: A colonial-style heritage hotel that dates back to 1829. Set amidst rolling hills and landscaped gardens, it offers a charming and tranquil escape in Ooty.

name: Taj Usha Kiran Palace, Gwalior
address: Jayendraganj, Lashkar, Gwalior, Madhya Pradesh 474009
about: A 120-year-old palace, this heritage hotel offers a regal experience with its Victorian architecture, antique furnishings, and royal suites. Indulge in the Jiva Spa and royal cuisine.

images.caption: Exterior of Taj Usha Kiran Palace

name: Taj Lakefront, Bhopal
address: Link Road No 3, Prempura, Bhopal, Madhya Pradesh 462003
about: A luxury hotel offering stunning views of the Upper Lake. With its contemporary design and signature Taj hospitality, it's a perfect destination for both business and leisure.

images.caption: Taj Lakefront hotel with lake view

name: Umaid Bhawan Palace, Jodhpur
address: Circuit House Rd, Cantt Area, Jodhpur, Rajasthan 342006
about: Perched high above the desert capital of Jodhpur, Umaid Bhawan Palace is one of the world's largest private residences. A part of the palace is managed by Taj Hotels. It is a golden-hued desert sandstone monument set amidst 26 acres of lush gardens.

images.caption: Aerial view of Umaid Bhawan Palace

name: Taj West End, Bengaluru
address: 25, Race Course Rd, High Grounds, Bengaluru, Karnataka 560001
about: Nestled amidst 20 acres of magnificent gardens, Taj West End is a lush, tropical paradise in the heart of Bengaluru. This heritage hotel offers colonial-era charm and luxurious tranquility.

images.caption: Lush gardens of Taj West End

name: Taj Coromandel, Chennai
address: 37, Mahatma Gandhi Rd, Nungambakkam, Chennai, Tamil Nadu 600034
about: A landmark of luxury in Chennai's city center. Known for its rich history and South Indian hospitality, it offers a blend of classic elegance and modern comforts.

images.caption: The grand lobby of Taj Coromandel

name: Taj Bengal, Kolkata
address: 34B, Belvedere Road, Alipore, Kolkata, West Bengal 700027
about: A landmark hotel in the upscale Alipore area, Taj Bengal offers a tranquil retreat with its beautiful gardens and atrium lobby. Experience the city's cultural heritage with signature Taj hospitality.

name: The Taj Mahal Hotel, New Delhi
address: 1, Man Singh Rd, South Block, Man Singh Road Area, New Delhi, Delhi 110011
about: An iconic hotel in the heart of Lutyens' Delhi, reflecting the heritage of Mughal Delhi. It offers a blend of timeless grace and contemporary luxury.

name: Taj Krishna, Hyderabad
address: Road No. 1, Mada Manzil, Banjara Hills, Hyderabad, Telangana 500034
about: Located in the prime Banjara Hills area, Taj Krishna offers panoramic views of the Hussain Sagar lake. A symbol of opulence and warm hospitality.

name: Taj Fort Aguada Resort & Spa, Goa
address: Sinquerim, Candolim, Goa 403515
about: Built on the ramparts of a 16th-century Portuguese fort, this resort offers panoramic views of the Arabian Sea. A perfect blend of scenic beauty and Goan-Portuguese heritage.

name: Taj Exotica Resort & Spa, Goa
address: Calwaddo, Benaulim, Goa 403716
about: A Mediterranean-inspired resort set amidst 56 acres of lush greenery, overlooking the pristine Benaulim beach. It offers a tranquil and luxurious escape in South Goa.

name: Taj Swarna, Amritsar
address: Plot No. C-3, Outer Circular Road, Amritsar, Punjab 143001
about: A stylish and contemporary hotel that captures the spirit of Amritsar. It offers modern luxury, expansive rooms, and is a short drive from the Golden Temple.

name: Vivanta Bengaluru, Whitefield
address: ITPL, Whitefield, Bengaluru, Karnataka 560066
about: Located in the heart of Bengaluru's IT hub, this hotel is a perfect blend of work and play. It features contemporary design, a rooftop pool, and vibrant dining options.

name: Taj Madikeri Resort & Spa, Coorg
address: 1st Monnangeri, Galibeedu, Madikeri, Karnataka 571201
about: Nestled in the rainforests of Coorg, this resort offers a serene and luxurious escape. It's built in traditional Kodagu style and provides breathtaking views of the valley.

name: Vivanta Bhubaneswar, DN Square
address: DN Regalia, DN Square, Kalinga Vihar, Patrapada, Bhubaneswar, Odisha 751019
about: A modern and stylish hotel in the temple city of Bhubaneswar. It features contemporary design, smart rooms, and is well-connected to the city's business and tourist hubs.

name: Taj Santacruz, Mumbai
address: Chhatrapati Shivaji Maharaj International Airport (Domestic Terminal), Off, Western Express Hwy, Santacruz East, Mumbai, Maharashtra 400099
about: A luxury hotel located right at the domestic terminal of the Mumbai airport. It offers opulent interiors, runway-facing rooms, and seamless convenience for travelers.

images.caption: Runway view from the hotel room

name: Vivanta Surajkund, NCR
address: Shooting Range Rd, Surajkund, Faridabad, Haryana 121009
about: An urban oasis that offers a refreshing retreat from the city's hustle. Inspired by the concept of a stepwell, it features stunning architecture, a large central courtyard, and a rejuvenating spa.

name: Jai Mahal Palace, Jaipur
address: Jacob Rd, Civil Lines, Jaipur, Rajasthan 302006
about: A magnificent heritage hotel dating back to 1745. Set amidst 18 acres of Mughal gardens, this palace offers a unique blend of royal history, Indo-Saracenic architecture, and modern luxury.

name: Vivanta Guwahati, Assam
address: Mahapurush Srimanta Sankardeva Rd, Khanapara, Guwahati, Assam 781022
about: A stylish and contemporary hotel in the gateway to Northeast India. It offers modern comforts, expansive lawns, and is a perfect base to explore the region.

name: The Gateway Hotel, Nashik
address: P-17, Midc, Ambad, Mumbai Agra Road, Nashik, Maharashtra 422010
about: Set in a tranquil oasis, this hotel is a perfect escape in the wine capital of India. It offers lush green landscapes, a large pool, and is close to the industrial hub.

images.caption: Poolside at The Gateway Hotel, Nashik

name: Vivanta Pune, Hinjawadi
address: Xion Complex, Hinjawadi Rd, Hinjawadi, Pune, Maharashtra 411057
about: A contemporary hotel located in Pune's IT hub. It's designed for the modern traveler with smart spaces, a rooftop pool, and vibrant social areas.

name: Taj Aravali Resort & Spa, Udaipur
address: 1, Kheemach Kheda, Village, Bhujra, Udaipur, Rajasthan 313001
about: Nestled in the Aravalli hills, this sprawling resort offers a contemporary take on Rajasthani architecture. It features luxurious rooms, a large pool, and a range of outdoor activities.

name: The Gateway Hotel, Jodhpur
address: Banar Rd, P.W.D. Colony, Jodhpur, Rajasthan 342001
about: Set against the backdrop of the majestic Mehrangarh Fort, this hotel offers a tranquil retreat with its blend of traditional Rajasthani architecture and modern amenities.

images.caption: Exterior of The Gateway Hotel, Jodhpur

name: Taj Malabar Resort & Spa, Cochin
address: Willingdon Island, Kochi, Kerala 682009
about: Located on Willingdon Island with stunning views of the Cochin harbour and backwaters, this heritage hotel is a beautiful blend of old-world charm and modern luxury.

name: Vivanta Goa, Panaji
address: Dr D B Bandodkar Road, Panaji, Goa 403001
about: A stylish hotel in the heart of Panaji, offering panoramic views of the Mandovi River and the city. It's a great base to explore both North and South Goa.

name: Taj Chandigarh
address: Block No. 9, Sector 17-A, Chandigarh, 160017
about: Located in the city's prime business and shopping hub, Sector 17, Taj Chandigarh celebrates the modern and progressive spirit of the city with its contemporary design and warm hospitality.

name: Taj Exotica Resort & Spa, Andamans
address: Radhanagar Beach, Havelock Island, Andaman and Nicobar Islands 744211
about: A luxurious eco-resort set on the pristine Radhanagar Beach. It features stilted villas inspired by Jarawa huts, offering a unique and sustainable experience in paradise.

name: Taj Kumarakom Resort & Spa, Kerala
address: 1/404, Kumarakom, Kottayam, Kerala 686563
about: A charming resort on the banks of Vembanad Lake, offering a serene backwater experience. Housed in a colonial-era bungalow, it provides a blend of heritage and modern luxury.

images.caption: View of the backwaters from the resort

name: Taj Bekal Resort & Spa, Kerala
address: Kappil Beach, Bekal, Kerala 671319
about: A stunning resort inspired by Kettuvallam houseboats, set amidst the serene backwaters and a pristine beach. It's a perfect destination for wellness and relaxation.

name: Taj Corbett Resort & Spa, Uttarakhand
address: Zero Garjia, Dhikuli, Ramnagar, Uttarakhand 244715
about: Located on the banks of the river Kosi, this resort offers a wild and adventurous escape in the foothills of the Himalayas, close to the Corbett National Park.

name: Vivanta Navi Mumbai, Turbhe
address: Thane - Belapur Rd, Turbhe, Navi Mumbai, Maharashtra 400705
about: A stylish hotel in the business district of Navi Mumbai. It offers modern amenities, a rooftop pool, and easy connectivity to both Mumbai and Pune.

name: Taj Theog Resort & Spa, Shimla
address: Tehsil, Theog, Himachal Pradesh 171201
about: A picturesque resort nestled in the Himalayan forests, offering stunning views of the Churdhar peak. It's a perfect escape for those seeking peace and luxury away from the bustle of Shimla.

name: Vivanta Coimbatore
address: 105, Race Course Rd, Gopalapuram, Coimbatore, Tamil Nadu 641018
about: A chic and contemporary hotel in the heart of Coimbatore. It offers stylish rooms, a rooftop pool, and is known for its vibrant ambience and excellent service.

name: The Gateway Hotel, Madurai
address: No. 4, Pasumalai Hills, Madurai, Tamil Nadu 625004
about: Perched atop the Pasumalai hill, this colonial-era hotel offers panoramic views of the city and the Meenakshi Temple. It's a peaceful retreat with lush gardens and heritage charm.

name: Vivanta Sikkim, Pakyong
address: Pakyong, Sikkim 737106
about: A modern hotel offering stunning views of the surrounding hills, located near the Pakyong Airport. It's a great starting point to explore the beauty of Sikkim.

name: Taj Hari Mahal, Jodhpur
address: 5, Residency Rd, Jodhpur, Rajasthan 342001
about: A modern hotel built in the style of a Marwari palace. Set in 6 acres of landscaped gardens, it offers a blend of royal charm and contemporary luxury.

name: The Gateway Hotel, Visakhapatnam
address: Beach Rd, Pandurangapuram, Visakhapatnam, Andhra Pradesh 530002
about: Offering stunning views of the Bay of Bengal, this hotel is a perfect blend of business and leisure. It's located on the beach road, close to the city center.

name: Vivanta Thiruvananthapuram
address: CV Raman Pillai Rd, Thycaud, Thiruvananthapuram, Kerala 695014
about: A stylish and contemporary hotel in the heart of Kerala's capital. It's a great base for both business travelers and those looking to explore the city's temples and beaches.

name: Taj Club House, Chennai
address: No. 2, Club House Rd, Express Estate, Royapettah, Chennai, Tamil Nadu 600002
about: A chic and contemporary hotel in the city center. Known for its trendy design, rooftop restaurant, and sophisticated atmosphere.

images.caption: Rooftop pool at Taj Club House

name: Devi Ratn, Jaipur - IHCL SeleQtions
address: Jamdoli, Agra Rd, Ballupura, Jaipur, Rajasthan 302031
about: A stunning architectural marvel inspired by the Jantar Mantar observatory. This resort offers a unique and futuristic take on Rajasthani design, with spacious rooms and panoramic Aravalli views.

name: The Connaught, New Delhi - IHCL SeleQtions
address: 37, Shaheed Bhagat Singh Marg, Connaught Place, New Delhi, Delhi 110001
about: A stylish hotel located in the heart of Connaught Place. It blends classic Georgian architecture with contemporary design, offering a vibrant and chic experience.

name: President, Mumbai - IHCL SeleQtions
address: 90, Cuffe Parade, Mumbai, Maharashtra 400005
about: An iconic hotel in South Mumbai, known for its vibrant dining scene, including the famous Thai Pavilion. It offers panoramic views of the city and the sea.

name: Ginger Mumbai, Airport
address: Opp. Aghadi Nagar, Military Rd, Bhavani Nagar, Marol, Andheri East, Mumbai, Maharashtra 400059
about: A smart and stylish hotel designed for the modern traveler. Located close to the airport, it offers a comfortable and hassle-free stay with lean-luxe amenities.
